participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and ambitious, Emily is focused on her goals and enjoys being involved in school activities. She has a flair for leadership, as evident from her homecoming queen title.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. i'm currently in high school. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, Liam is deeply connected to his spiritual journey and values mindfulness. He embraces silence and believes in the power of meditation to achieve inner peace.
participant_2.background: i live in alaska. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i am a buddhist. i have not spoken in three months. i like meditation.
